Implement Phase 4: Add Task Functionality

GOAL:  Implement the ability to add new tasks via Enter key or Add button click

TASKS:
- Generate unique IDs for tasks (timestamp or UUID-like)
- Create in-memory array to store task objects {id, text, completed, createdAt}
- Implement addTask function that creates task from input value
- Validate input: ignore empty/whitespace-only submissions
- Clear input field after successful task addition
- Implement renderTasks function to display all tasks in the DOM
- Bind Enter key on input field to add task
- Bind click on Add button to add task
- Hide empty state when tasks exist, show when no tasks
- New tasks appear at bottom of list

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Typing text and pressing Enter creates a new task
- Clicking Add button creates a new task
- Empty or whitespace-only input is ignored (no task created)
- Input field clears after task is added
- New tasks appear at the bottom of the list
